name: Real Time Congress Vote Tracker
author: SidHarrell

sections.description:
Somewhat usable now. Moved from alpha to beta. Send feedback to sidney.harrell@gmail.com
Using the Sunlight Labs real-time congress vote tracker API to provide a widget display.

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the widget to a widget area
sections.faq:
You are so cool. How did you get to be that cool?

Capt. Picard taught me everything I know.
sections.changelog:
=0.4=
Data is being parsed. Reduced size of data fetched from Sunlight. Displays in nice little table now.

=0.3=
* Actually spits out data, next step is to parse the data into a usable format

=0.2=
* Fixed stability issue

=0.1=
* Basic framework

short_description: Gives you a display of what is being voted on in Congress in real time.
